sentences.en: A somnambulist can happily combine sleep and exercise.
sentences.cn: 梦游者能把睡眠和运动巧妙地结合在一起.

sentences.en: Carbon, hydrogen and oxygen combine chemically to form carbohydrates and fats.
sentences.cn: 碳、氢、氧化合形成碳水化合物和脂肪。

sentences.en: Combine the beans, chopped mint and olive oil in a large bowl.
sentences.cn: 将菜豆、切碎的薄荷和橄榄油放在大碗里搅拌。

sentences.en: Combine the flour with 3 tablespoons water to make a paste.
sentences.cn: 往面粉里加3大勺水揉成面团。

sentences.en: Combine the stock, whole onion and peppercorns in a pan and bring to a simmer.
sentences.cn: 将高汤、一整头洋葱和胡椒粒一起放在平底锅里，开小火炖。

sentences.en: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.cn: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.en: Different states or groups can combine to enlarge their markets.
sentences.cn: 不同的州或企业集团可以联合起来以扩大市场。

sentences.en: Good carpet wool needs to combine softness with strength.
sentences.cn: 优质的地毯羊毛需要兼备柔性和韧性。

sentences.en: He was the man who invented the combine harvester.
sentences.cn: 他就是发明联合收割机的人.

sentences.en: He will combine the two jobs over the next three years.
sentences.cn: 今后3年，他将同时兼顾这两项工作。

sentences.en: Hydrogen and oxygen combine to form water.
I am partial to desserts that combine fresh fruit with fine pastry.
sentences.cn: 我偏爱加有新鲜水果的精致油酥甜点。

sentences.en: I had been looking for ways to combine harmonic and rhythmic struc-tures.
sentences.cn: 我过去一直在寻找将和声和节奏结合起来的方法。

sentences.en: Let us combine our firms against our competitors.
sentences.cn: 让我们把公司联合起来,对付和我们竞争的公司.

sentences.en: Relief workers say it's worse than ever as disease and starvation combine to kill thousands.
sentences.cn: 救灾人员说疾病加上饥饿夺去了数千人的生命，严重程度前所未有。

sentences.en: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.cn: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

sentences.en: The combine had cut a swathe around the edge of the field.
sentences.cn: 联合收割机把庄稼绕田边割了一长条。

sentences.en: The furniture managed to combine practicality with elegance.
sentences.cn: 那些家具将实用和典雅完美结合。

words.tran_cn: 结合的；可结合的；有结合力的
结合；组合；联合；[化学] 化合
使结合；联合（combine的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a machine used by farmers to cut grain, separate the seeds from it, and clean it

trans.tran_cn: 使结合，混合，融合，协力，联合，同时做，（人）兼具，兼有，（使）结合；（使）联合；（使）合并；（使）综合
trans.tran_en: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together
if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together
